response.overview: Based on a true story, during World War II, four Jewish brothers escape their Nazi-occupied homeland of West Belarus in Poland and join the Soviet partisans to combat the Nazis. The brothers begin the rescue of roughly 1,200 Jews still trapped in the ghettos of Poland.
response.tagline: Freedom begins with an act of defiance
response.title: Defiance

titles.title: Defiance – Für meine Brüder, die niemals aufgaben
